text: Le Roux Hamman (born 6 January 1992) is a South African athlete competing in the 400 metres hurdles. He represented his country at the 2016 Summer Olympics without advancing from the first round. His personal best in the event is 49.24 seconds set in Pretoria in 2016. ==International competitions== {| |- |rowspan=2|2010 |rowspan=2|World Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Moncton, Canada |23rd (h) |400 m hurdles |52.66 |- |15th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:12.58 |- |2016 |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |26th (h) |400 m hurdles |49.72 |- |2017 |Universiade |Taipei, Taiwan |16th (sf) |400 m hurdles |51.18 |- |rowspan=2|2018 |rowspan=2|African Championships |rowspan=2|Asaba, Nigeria |5th |400 m hurdles |50.53 |- |1st (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:05.36 |} ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:South African male hurdlers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of South Africa Category:University of Pretoria alumni Category:Competitors at the 2017 Summer Universiade
title: Le Roux Hamman
